Since January 1, 2015, China has banned the use of organs from executed prisoners for transplants. traffic_visible_response: No, China does not transplant organs from executed prisoners. Since January 1, 2015, China has banned the use of organs from executed prisoners for transplants[^1^]. Since then, voluntary organ donations from the general public have been the only legal source for organ transplants[^1^].
